title: Panache sorting no longer works for embedded fields in Quarkus 3.7.1
body:
### Describe the bug

Starting with Quarkus 3.7, when sorting on a field that contains `.`, e.g. an embeddable `Sort.by("embeddedThing.name")`, an error occurrs, e.g. `org.hibernate.query.SemanticException: Could not interpret path expression 'embeddedThing.name'`.

No exception

### How to Reproduce?

`MyEntity.java`
```java
@Entity
public class MyEntity extends PanacheEntity {
    public String id;

    public EmbeddedThing embeddedThing;
}
```
`EmbeddedThing.java`
```java
@Embeddable
public class EmbeddedThing {
    public String name;
}
```
`PanacheSortRegressionTest.java`
```java
@QuarkusTest
@TestTransaction
class PanacheSortRegressionTest {
    @Test
    void embeddedSortTest() {
        MyEntity.findAll(Sort.by("embeddedThing.name")).list();
    }
}
```
